From the brand

SHLINUX LIGHTING Brand:

Shlinux always focus the Research and Innovation in lighting industryWe have been adhering to the principle of quality firstOur Team create this kind of desk lamp with remote, very practical and functional!We still make unremitting efforts to create better productsBest Wishes ÔºÅ

Shlinux Distinct Desk Lamp

White color remote control desk lamp, light up your working station

18W LED 3 Modes 6 Brightness, Modern Desk Light for Home Office

A bright desk lamp suitable for 2 computers lighting. fits nicely behind the monitor, extend up and over to shine on their surface.

„ÄêStepless Dimming with two control ways„Äë LED lamp has 3 color modes for warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), white light(6000K). Each lighting mode has 6 brightness dimming levels. So there are 18 lighting modes to meet all requirements. This architect desk lamp is controlled by touch sensitive switch on lamp bar or a remote controller, very conveniently
„ÄêEye Protection and Memory Function„Äë Our clamp light is composed of 96 LED beads, it has uniform brightness, NO GLARE, NO FLICKERING, soft light, which can protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, It is ideal for reading, drawing, sewing, working, studying. The clamp desk lamp is a good help for kids & bookworms, one key for reading mode, memory function can keep the mode and brightness last used
„ÄêSpace Saving and Modern Style„Äë Task light with sturdy metal clamp, which can support a tabletop thickness up to 2.6 inches. It holds the gooseneck lamp securely in place. The metal clamp is also equipped with a silicone pad to avoid scratching table. The flexible gooseneck study lamp, which can be adjusted 360¬∞ to provide multi-directional lighting, and is easy to carry and more save space than stand-up desk lamp
„ÄêQuality Warranty„ÄëSHLINUX always supply good quality led lamp. what included in box : A Shlinux led desk light, An English Manual & Quality Power Adapter and warranty service, and 24H friendly customer support

SHLINUX Upgrade 18W Bright Led Gooseneck Desk Lamp Illuminate Entire Workbench

SHLINUX clamp lamp has 96 LED Beads,18.2 inch lamp bar in length, offer 1511 Lumen, about 100w incandescent bulb equivalent, to illuminate every corner of your table,Born with 360¬∞adjustable gooseneck design with durable metal clamp, SHLINUX study lamp is fully diffused and lighting stably and gently without flickering, also which can prevent blue light damaged to the eyes.

It is featured with memory function,then your last lighting setting will be turned on again when work lamp was powered-on,very convenient. saving space with a metal clamp supports to 2.6inch/7.5cm wide desk, fix the clamp light where needed, it won’t take any desk space.

It supports 3 colors and 6 brightness levels under each color mode,you will get 18 lighting modes to meet all your daily requirements

EYE-CARING, NO FLICKER, NO GLARE

NO LIMIT LIGHT DIRECTION, NO SHADOW !

Specifications:

Material: metal + silicone

Light bar length: 18.2 inch/ 46 cm

LED numbers: 96 Led beads

Lumen: 1511 Lumen

Brightness: 6 levels

Color temperature: 3000K-6000K

CRI: RA>95

Control type: Touch & Remote

SHLINUX Architect Desk Clamp Lamp

Upgrade Horizontal lighting bar with Flexible Gooseneck

This work light is most suitable for a workbench with 1 or 2 computers, providing enough brightness, the task lamp is light, easy to install, the lighting angle can be adjusted freely, suitable for work, study, reading.

  • No flickering LEDs and diffused lighting gently
  • 360¬∞flexible gooseneck design allow bend to any direction
  • Durable structure with metal and silicone
  • Metal Clamp: 2.6 inch/7.5 cm thickness desk edge
  • Maximum Lighting height: 28.5 inch

Read more

HIGH COLOR RENDERING

EASY TO CONTROL THIS MODERN DESK LAMP

It supports two types to control the study lamp

Sensitive touch (one key will finish all functions select exclude the timer)

  • Short touch will change the color
  • Holding touch will change the brightness

Remote Control

  • Dimming Up / Down: 6 Brightness levels
  • Colors Select: Warm white / white / warm
  • Timing setting: 3 minutes(one press)/ 30 minutes( twice)/60 miutes(three times)
  • Mode select: Sleeping mode / Reading mode

SUPER BRIGHT DESK LAMP, SUITABLE for DETAILED OPERATION

Product Description

Customized & Personalized Settings: Our LED desk lamp has 5 color modes and 7 brightness levels to choose from, you can create the perfect ambience with our desk lamp‚Äôs unique combination for for your activity or environment like living room, bedroom, baby room, study room, office.
Functional USB charging port: Don‚Äôt sacrifice charging for lighting – a built-in USB port keeps your phone at a full charge and within reach.
Adjustable Design: Freedom to cast the perfect spotlight, tilt the head up 135 degrees and swivel 90 degrees; the lamp base tilts down to 150 degrees and swivels 45 degrees.
Energy Efficient LED: Featuring outstanding environmental performance, switch your traditional table lamp to ours to help reduce the electricity bill by up to 75%.
